tooltips.liltBinary: Path to the Lilt binary executable. Use 'Identify' to automatically find it in PATH.
tooltips.soxBinary: Path to SoX binary (required when not using Docker).
tooltips.ffmpegBinary: Path to FFmpeg binary (required for ALAC support when not using Docker).
tooltips.ffprobeBinary: Path to FFprobe binary (required for metadata when not using Docker).
tooltips.sourceFolder: Folder containing audio files to convert.
tooltips.useDocker: Use Docker container for processing (recommended). When enabled, local binaries are not required.
tooltips.dockerImage: Docker image to use for processing. Default: ardakilic/sox_ng:latest
tooltips.enforceOutputFormat: Convert all audio files to the specified format.
tooltips.noPreserveMetadata: Skip copying metadata and cover art from original files.
tooltips.copyImages: Copy JPG and PNG files from source to target directory.
tooltips.downloadLilt: Open GitHub releases page to download the latest Lilt binary.

about.title: What is Lilt GUI?
about.description: Lilt GUI is a modern, cross-platform graphical user interface for Lilt - the lightweight intelligent lossless transcoder for Hi-Res FLAC and ALAC files.
about.purpose: This application provides an intuitive interface to convert high-resolution audio files while preserving quality and metadata.

features.title: Key Features
features.modern: Modern interface with dark/light theme support
features.docker: Built-in Docker integration for hassle-free transcoding
features.formats: Support for FLAC, ALAC, and MP3 output formats
features.batch: Batch processing with preserved folder structure
features.metadata: Optional copying of ID3 tags and cover art

usage.title: How to Use
usage.step1: 1. Configure binary paths or enable Docker mode
usage.step2: 2. Select source folder containing your audio files
usage.step3: 3. Choose target folder for converted files
